info.name: Calendar
info.summary: Calendar GUI for ownCloud's CalDAV server
info.description:
A calendar app for ownCloud. Easily sync events from various devices with your ownCloud and edit them online.
* 🚀 **Integration with other ownCloud apps!** Currently Contacts - more to come. * 🌐 **WebCal Support!** Want to see your favorite team’s matchdays in your calendar? No problem! * 🙋 **Attendees!** Invite people to your events. * 🙈 **We’re not reinventing the wheel!** Based on the great [davclient.js](https://github.com/evert/davclient.js), [ical.js](https://github.com/mozilla-comm/ical.js) and [fullcalendar](https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar) libraries.
info.author: Georg Ehrke, Raghu Nayyar, Bernhard Fröhler
info.description: Calendar GUI for the server-integrated CalDAV server
